summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 PONTIAC G6. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE SUSPENSION WAS UNSTABLE AND THE VEHICLE WAS WOBBLING IN THE FRONT AND ON BOTH SIDES. AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC REPLACED THE FRONT PASSENGER SIDE BALL JOINT, BUT THE FAILURE INTERMITTENTLY PROGRESSED. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE NOT AVAILABLE.
